reviews.review_msg: midterms were hard!! atleast when u realize your grade on it.this class requires hell lot of reading ,so don't rely on his lectures notes only bcz ur gonna end up failing if u do so. His teaching style is strange, as he asks more than he tells. Also ,i had no interest what so ever prior to class .ur 1st midterm mark is going to reflect final mark.

Funny, nice, helpful professor but his lectures don't always cover everything you need for the exam, so reading is a must. His posted notes are VERY incomplete, and there are no lecture recordings so lecture is pretty much mandatory. Tutorials are interesting, but for the most part useless because they don't really review lecture material.
